version_description: - Support for older devices (iPhone 5C, iPad 4, iPod etc.)

- New languages

This update brings new major features!
- New EURAD and USRAD model: the precipitation layer for the current time is based on radar and satellite readings from US and Europe and it is updated every 20 minutes. This is huge a improvement in accuracy.
- Lightning forecast: you can see the lightning forecast for the whole world directly on the precipitation layer.
- Bug fixes

This update brings new major features!
- New EURAD and USRAD model: the precipitation layer for the current time is based on radar and satellite readings from US and Europe and it is updated every 20 minutes. This is huge a improvement in accuracy.
- Lightning forecast: you can see the lightning forecast for the whole world directly on the precipitation layer.
- Bug fixes

Another major update with a lots of new features is here!
- Beautiful widget with weather forecast and weather warnings
- Another zoom containing very detail maps showing roads, lakes, small cities, streets etc. (available for the highest zoom)
- Names of all tropical cyclones around the world
- New weather icons
- New weather layer: maximum wind gusts (up to 10 days)

Another major update with a lots of new features is here!
- Beautiful widget with weather forecast and weather warnings
- Another zoom containing very detail maps showing roads, lakes, small cities, streets etc. (available for the highest zoom)
- Names of all tropical cyclones around the world
- New weather icons
- New weather layer: maximum wind gusts (up to 10 days)

Finally, our app offers radar composite with amazing features! Ventusky is one of the first apps in the world to offer a view of the intensity of precipitation worldwide.
- Radar: worldwide coverage, high resolution, realtime update
- Bug fixes

New version is here with beautiful new maps!
- New map tiles (finally include roads, mountains and urban areas)
- Map tiles are saved as a vector graphics - they are sharp on all devices
- New model for USA called NBM (National Blend of Models - forecast is based on a blend of several numerical weather predictions)
- Dark mode support
- Bug fixes

New version is here with beautiful new maps!
- New map tiles (finally include roads, mountains and urban areas)
- Map tiles are saved as a vector graphics - they are sharp on all devices
- New model for USA called NBM (National Blend of Models - forecast is based on a blend of several numerical weather predictions)
- Dark mode support
- Bug fixes

- Faster data loading
- New Help section
- Bug fixes

- Faster data loading
- New Help section
- Bug fixes

3D Globe is here!
Weather map is now displayed in 3D. You can see all weather layers on mesmerizing 3D Globe. This is a huge step for our app. Now you can watch weather maps without a distortion. For example, weather around the North Pole is clearly visible. Enjoy the most advanced weather app so far.

More features:
- New layer that shows new snow cover. You can easily see how much snow will fall in the upcoming days.
- Bug fixes

Latitude-longitude grid
We have added professional grid showing GPS coordinates. This grid is extremely useful. Now you can easily navigate at sea, on an airplane or during your trip to nature.

Latitude-longitude grid
We have added professional grid showing GPS coordinates. This grid is extremely useful. Now you can easily navigate at sea, on an airplane or during your trip to nature.

New major update is here! 
- Ventusky now displays detailed information about air quality! Thanks to the cooperation with the Finnish Meteorological Institute, you can now view forecast of all major air pollutants (NO2, SO2, PM10, PM2.5, O3, dust or CO).
- You can finally tap on the map to display detailed weather forecast for any location on the world.
- Bug fixes

- Bug fixes

Ventusky newly displays satellite images of America, Australia and Asia! We download data from three geostationary satellites - GOES16, GOES17 and Himawari. Images are available in high resolution in real time. Please note that Europe and Africa is not covered in this first version.

Ventusky newly displays satellite images of America, Australia and Asia! We download data from three geostationary satellites - GOES16, GOES17 and Himawari. Images are available in high resolution in real time. Please note that Europe and Africa is not covered in this first version.

We have started to display satellite images for Europe and Africa! Images are downloaded from two satellites named as Meteosat 8 and 11 (source Eumetsat). Views of the Earth from space are so beautiful.

We have started to display satellite images for Europe and Africa! Images are downloaded from two satellites named as Meteosat 8 and 11 (source Eumetsat). Views of the Earth from space are so beautiful.

Amazing new widgets - we have created three new widgets with daily or hourly forecast (for iOS 14 or higher).
Bug fixes

Bug fixes

- We have started to label all the pressure lows (as L) and highs (as H) arround the world. You can easily see where the center of the pressure system is located.

- Bug fixes

Stunning and smooth animations are now available. The transitions between each forecast times are fast and smooth. We are interpolating all values between forecast times with our state-of-the-art 3D technology. The changes and development of the weather is now much better visible.

We have also added a new climate layer "Precipitation Monthly Anomaly". It shows precipitation anomaly from the long-term average for a period from the first day of the month to a user selected day of the month.

Stunning and smooth animations are now available. The transitions between each forecast times are fast and smooth. We are interpolating all values between forecast times with our state-of-the-art 3D technology. The changes and development of the weather is now much better visible.

We have also added a new climate layer "Precipitation Monthly Anomaly". It shows precipitation anomaly from the long-term average for a period from the first day of the month to a user selected day of the month.
